verses.verse: Wherefore <S%G5620><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> longed for <S%G1973><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> crown <S%G4735><s%>, so <S%G3779><s%> stand fast <S%G4739><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, my beloved <S%G27><s%>.
I exhort <S%G3870><s%> Euodia <S%G2136><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I exhort <S%G3870><s%> Syntyche <S%G846><s%>, to <S%G5426><s%> be of the same mind in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.

Yea <S%G2532><s%>, I beseech <S%G2065><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, true <S%G1103><s%> yokefellow <S%G4805><s%>, help <S%G4815><s%> these women <S%G846><s%>, for they <S%G3748><s%> labored <S%G4866><s%> with me <S%G3427><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%>, with <S%G3326><s%> Clement <S%G2815><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the rest <S%G3062><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> fellow-workers <S%G4904><s%>, whose <S%G3739><s%> names <S%G3686><s%> are in <S%G1722><s%> the book <S%G976><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>.
Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> always <S%G3842><s%>: again <S%G3825><s%> I will say <S%G2046><s%>, Rejoice <S%G5463><s%>.
Let <S%G1097><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> forbearance <S%G1933><s%> be known <S%G1097><s%> unto <S%G444><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%>. The Lord <S%G2962><s%> is at hand <S%G1451><s%>.

In nothing <S%G3367><s%> be anxious <S%G3309><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%> by prayer <S%G4335><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> supplication <S%G1162><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> let <S%G1107><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> requests <S%G155><s%> be made known <S%G1107><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the peace <S%G1515><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, which passeth <S%G5242><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> understanding <S%G3563><s%>, shall guard <S%G5432><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G3540><s%> thoughts <S%G5216><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

Finally <S%G3063><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, whatsoever things <S%G3745><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> true <S%G227><s%>, whatsoever things <S%G3745><s%> are honorable <S%G4586><s%>, whatsoever things <S%G3745><s%> are just <S%G1342><s%>, whatsoever things <S%G3745><s%> are pure <S%G53><s%>, whatsoever things <S%G3745><s%> are lovely <S%G4375><s%>, whatsoever things <S%G3745><s%> are of good report <S%G2163><s%>; if <S%G1487><s%> there be any <S%G5100><s%> virtue <S%G703><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> there be any <S%G5100><s%> praise <S%G1868><s%>, think on <S%G3049><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>.

The things <S%G5023><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> ye <S%G3129><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> learned <S%G3129><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> received <S%G3880><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>, these things do <S%G4238><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> I rejoice <S%G5463><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> greatly <S%G3171><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> at length <S%G4218><s%> ye have revived <S%G330><s%> your thought <S%G5426><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>; wherein3739, Esther9 ye did indeed <S%G5426><s%> take <S%G2532><s%> thought <S%G5426><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> ye lacked opportunity <S%G170><s%>.

Not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I speak <S%G3004><s%> in respect of <S%G2596><s%> want <S%G5304><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> have learned <S%G3129><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> state I am <S%G1510><s%>, therein to be <S%G1511><s%> content <S%G842><s%>.

I know1492, 2532 how <S%G1492><s%> to be abased <S%G5013><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I know also how <S%G1492><s%> to abound <S%G1722><s%>: in everything <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> have I learned <S%G3453><s%> the secret both <S%G2532><s%> to be filled <S%G5526><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to be hungry <S%G3983><s%>, both <S%G2532><s%> to abound <S%G4052><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to be in want <S%G5302><s%>.
I can do <S%G2480><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G5547><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> strengtheneth <S%G1743><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>.
Howbeit <S%G4133><s%> ye <S%G4160><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> that ye had fellowship <S%G4790><s%> with <S%G2347><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> affliction <S%G2347><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> ye yourselves also <S%G2532><s%> know <S%G1492><s%>, ye <S%G5210><s%> Philippians <S%G5374><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> I departed <S%G1831><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%>, no <S%G3762><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> had fellowship with <S%G2841><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the matter <S%G3056><s%> of giving <S%G1394><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> receiving <S%G1487><s%> but <S%G3361><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> only <S%G3441><s%>;

for <S%G3754><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Thessalonica <S%G2332><s%> ye sent <S%G3992><s%> once2532, 530 and <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G1364><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3427><s%> need <S%G5532><s%>.

Not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I seek <S%G1934><s%> for the gift <S%G1390><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> I seek <S%G1934><s%> for the fruit <S%G2590><s%> that increaseth <S%G4121><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> account <S%G3056><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> I have <S%G568><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G2532><s%>, and abound <S%G4052><s%>: I am filled <S%G4137><s%>, having received <S%G1209><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> Epaphroditus <S%G1891><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> that came from <S%G3844><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, an odor <S%G3744><s%> of a sweet smell <S%G2175><s%>, a sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> acceptable <S%G1184><s%>, well-pleasing <S%G2101><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> shall supply <S%G4137><s%> every3956, 5216 need <S%G5532><s%> of yours <S%G5216><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> riches <S%G4149><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> unto our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> be the glory <S%G1391><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>.

Salute <S%G782><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> saint <S%G40><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>. The brethren that are <S%G80><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> salute <S%G782><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>.
All <S%G3956><s%> the saints <S%G40><s%> salute <S%G782><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, especially3122, 1161 they that are <S%G3588><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> Caesar <S%G2541><s%>'s household <S%G3614><s%>.
